android_install_step_one:
Vula isikhangeli sefowuni yakho     

iCompass

Yongeza iCompass yoMgaqo-siseko kwiscreen sasekhaya  

ibhena kwaye ulandele imiyalelo
android_install_step_two:
Ukuba ibhena ayibonakali, cofa kwibar yeSixhobo kwi

kwikona ephezulu ngasekunene, emva koko ucofe "Faka i-App".
android_install_step_three: Ukuvula i-App, yifumane kwiscreen sakho sasekhaya
cases_feature_text: Khawuleza ukhangele kuhlelo oludityanisiweyo noluhlaziyiweyo lweMithetho yeNdlu yoWiso-mthetho.
guides_feature_text: Izikhokelo ezikhawulezayo kwinjongo nentsingiselo yecandelo ngalinye loMqulu wamaLungelo kunye nezinye izahluko ezisetyenziswa kakhulu zoMgaqo-siseko.
if_no_safari_instruction:
• Open your Safari browser
    Note: It must be Safari, you cannot use Google Chrome or Firefox.
  • Go to  bit.ly/concompass
ios_install_text:
Skrolela ezantsi kwaye ucofe "Yongeza kwiSkrini saseKhaya" emva koko ucofe "Yongeza"


Ukuvula i-App, yifumane kwiscreen sakho sasekhaya
main_content:
Constitution Compass

The Constitution App for Members of Parliament.

Browse, search and understand the South African Constitution and how it applies to everyone. Continuously updated and curated Constitution and  Rules of the National Assembly .
rules_feature_text: Accessible guides to the South African Constitutional Courtâ€™s authoritative interpretation of the Constitution.
search_feature_text: Search across the Constitution, Rules, Guides or Cases to find the information that you need.
search_feature_title: Find what you are looking for
tap_share_icon_text: Tap the share icon at the bottom of the screen
